about_the_game:
Hentai IQ Puzzle - Art Book - contains 20 images with girls on pdf format.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is not a pornographic product, so there are no scenes of coition or scenes with a sexually suggestive context. The main function of the game is to solve mathematics tasks. After completing level you take reward - the opportunity without censorship to enjoy the aesthetics of the beautiful female body created by artist in the style of "Nude (Art)". 
The Nude (Art) - is a tradition in Western art, and has been used to express ideals of female beauty and other human qualities.
Recommended age for playing 18+
All characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
